Jusyt thought I'd get a couple of facts straight as I
suspect both of you didn't read either my opening post
or my bio. Just a couple of important facts to bear in
mind-
1. Shadowcaster was so good at keeping himself and his
1 man warr hidden during the great War that he became
a Cybertronian Urban myth if you will.

2. Shadowcaster is Rattrap's son

3. Tankorr I suggest you check out the post 'A hero
reborn to get the right perspective on how the other
characters who were in the Beast Wars feel about
Shadowcaster. The short version is that during the
beast wars he went a little nuts- nothing insane, but
he used maximal and predacon alike in an obsessive
attempt at revenge at Megatron for killing Rattrap's
mother and his mate.  After a major defeat by
Megatron, he decided that the only way to defeat him
was to gain strength from the matrix of leadership,
which reformatted him into a TM3 and the former
leaders inside the matrix made his lay his ghosts to
rest and he became an heroic Guardian to the Maximals,
valiantly sacrificing himself defending the Ark
against the attack by Megatron using the Nemesis. As
far as all the characters knew, he's dead. In fact the
only reason that he's back alive is because Primus
removed his spark from the matrix and rebuilt his TM3
body so he could be one of his champions against
Unicron.

Hope that puts things in perspective guys.
